artist: Utagawa School; Poem by Umenoya Kakuju
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: man at right seated on a bench with PL leg drawn up; empty geta on floor, LRC; small tan cup on bench at right; seated man holds up his PR hand; seated man wears kimono of purple with white stripes and patterning; standing man at left with frowning expression, wearing a blue and white headscarf and a blue kimono
marks:
Inscription

[中村歌右衛門　行年五十九才 大坂中寺町浄国寺　法名歌成院翫雀日光信士
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Memorial Portrait of the Actor Nakamura Utaemon IV with Ichimura Takenojō V
